name: 吳傳威
objective: This course at first introducing the materials and their properties used  in the compound material, namely reniforced concrete. The basic concepts and theory of flexural behavior will then be introduced. Analysis as well as design of beams, slabs, columns and footings are given along with the concerning specification.
schedule:
1st week Orientation
2nd week Materials: concrete and steel
3rd week Basic concepts
4th week Design methods 
5th week Rectangular sections in bending 
6th week Balanced strain conditions
7th week Strength in tension reinforcement section
8th week Design of single reinforced beams
9th week Mid-term exam
10th week The two couple method
11th week Design of Double reinforced beams
12th week Strength in T-section
13th week Design of T-sections
14th week Shear reinforcement
15th week Shear reinforcement
16th week Developed length
17th week ACI bending coefficients
18th week Final exam.
scorePolicy:
1. Midterm exam.	 35%
2. Homework	 15%
3. Class attendant	  5%
4. Final exam.	 45%
